cause.description:
I want to try and stop teen violence. let band together and do something about this world before one more of our youth have to die.
1. Keep our streets safe for our CHILDREN
2. Teach our young to love and not hate
3. Stop our families from hurting over loosing a young one due to violence
cause.mission: Teach our youth's to love one and other
cause.name: In memory of Joey Tanner( Tan Tan)
